thread.title: Married couple charged with nearly 700 counts of child sex abuse against 10 children
thread.title_full: Married couple charged with nearly 700 counts of child sex abuse against 10 children

author: Abigail O'Leary
title: Married couple charged with nearly 700 counts of child sex abuse against 10 children
text:
News Married couple charged with nearly 700 counts of child sex abuse against 10 children Daniel Spurgeon, 47, and his wife Jenise, 52, are charged with more than 300 counts each after their arrest earlier this week Share The couple are currently awaiting extradition to Alabama to face nearly 700 charges Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
A married couple have been charged with nearly 700 counts of child sex abuse against 10 children. 
Daniel Spurgeon, 47, and his wife Jenise, 52, are charged with more than 300 counts each after their arrest earlier this week. 
The pair, from Florence, Alabama, were arrested following an investigation into the alleged abuse when a girl, now 19, went to police claiming she had been abused between he ages of 12 and 16. 
According to Florence Police, detected in Alabama were contacted by colleagues in Florida who alerted them to abuse allegations. Jenise Sturgeon is charged with 100 counts of child abuse (Photo: ) 
This sparked an investigation into the Spurgeons' past contact with children. 
Jenise Spurgeon was taken into custody on Wednesday, while Daniel was already serving time at the Lee Country Jail, in Florida. Daniel Spurgeon is being held on charges while already inside a Florida county jail (Photo: ) 
The couple moved to Florida's Cape Coral in 2015 and are currently awaiting extradition back to Alabama where they will face hundreds of abuse charges. 
Daniel Spurgeon is facing 100 counts each of first-degree sexual abuse, child abuse and enticing a child for immoral purposes. 
He also faces charges including sodomy, sexual torture, rape, domestic violence by strangulation and human trafficking. Police investigated their previous conduct with 10 children (Photo: Facebook) 
Charges against Jenise include 100 counts each of child abuse, endangering the welfare of a child and inciting a child for immoral purposes. 
She also faces a single count of domestic violence by strangulation and 11 charges of human trafficking. 
Police say the ages of the victims range from toddlers to teenagers. Like us on Facebook
